Becoming an AI-Driven Enterprise

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: AI, DataRobot, Enterprise

In this upcoming webinar, review the practical first steps an organization can take towards becoming an AI-driven enterprise, and learn how you cut through the hype of AI, apply it organization-wide, and quickly realize ROI.


Becoming an
AI-Driven Enterprise
How to generate ROI from AI with
the people & data you have today
Webinar Details Register today
Thursday, October 26, 2017 Speaker: 
1:00 pm Eastern / 10:00 am Pacific Greg Michaelson, PhD
45 minutes with Q&A Head of DataRobot Labs

Despite the advances in machine learning technology, including automation and a robust open source community, many organizations have yet to realize the true potential of their AI efforts – or are unsure how to begin. How do you cut through the hype of AI, apply it organization-wide, and quickly realize ROI?

During this webinar, Greg Michaelson, PhD, Head of DataRobot Labs and experienced data scientist, will review the practical first steps an organization can take towards becoming an AI-driven enterprise. He will describe how small, successful projects comprised of people and data you have today, and empowered with the right tools, build the momentum your organization needs to capitalize on the machine learning revolution. 

You will discover how to:
• Cut through the hype to understand the right steps to get started with AI
• Train users across your organization - including business leaders - to spot AI opportunities
• Systematically identify the opportunities best suited for accelerating your AI efforts and offering the highest ROI 

Speaker:
Greg Michaelson, PhD
Head of DataRobot Labs

Space is limited!

Register today


DataRobot, Inc | One International Place Boston MA 02110
